articles.title: How The Cadence Deal And Growth Outlook Are Shaping The Huntington Bancshares Investment Story
articles.mainIdea: How The Cadence Deal And Growth Outlook Are Shaping The Huntington Bancshares Investment Story
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: How The Cadence Deal And Growth Outlook Are Shaping The Huntington Bancshares Investment Story. Huntington Bancshares has seen its fair value estimate nudged up to $19.85 from $19.75, as refreshed models incorporate slightly stronger growth assumptions following the Cadence acquisition and recent results. A marginal decline in the discount rate to 7.29% from 7.32% reflects a modestly lower perceived risk profile, while revenue growth expectations have inched higher to about 25.11% from 25.02% on a firmer outlook for loan expansion in faster growing markets. Stay tuned to see how you can... Related tickers mentioned: HBANL, HBANM, HBANP.
